titles.title: A bill to convey Forest Service land to Flagstaff, Arizona.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-174.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 337.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Unfavorable.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Unfavorable.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey without consideration (rather than hold available for sale at fair market price as provided under current law) specified lands in Coconino County, Arizona, to the city of Flagstaff, Arizona, under special use permit. Retains a right of reversion to the United States if such lands are used for other than park and open space purposes.
